location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 567/46 'Appointment of Sheikh Mustapha Abdel Razek as Rector of el Azhar University'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 10; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the British Embassy, Cairo, and the Foreign Office, extracts from political and economic reports, and a news bulletin from the Journal Officielrelated to the appointment of the 'Rector' and 'Vice Rector' of el Ashar [al-Azhar].
